title: Automated IOC Enrichment Tool
description: Built a Python-based IOC enrichment tool integrating VirusTotal, AbuseIPDB, MISP, and OpenCTI to support SOC triage through automated lookup, tagging, and structured export.

title: Threat Hunting \& Attack Simulation Lab
description: Designed an enterprise-style threat hunting lab using Active Directory, Elastic Stack, and Wazuh to simulate MITRE ATT\&CK techniques and analyze Windows security event logs and endpoint telemetry.

title: Threat Detection Using Machine Learning
description: Developed a malware detection prototype using TensorFlow to study anomaly detection, alert behavior, and false positives in SOC monitoring contexts.
